const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "example",
  mappings: {
    properties: {
      location: {
        type: "geo_shape",
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);

const response1 = await client.index({
  index: "example",
  refresh: "true",
  document: {
    name: "Wind & Wetter, Berlin, Germany",
    location: {
      type: "point",
      coordinates: [13.400544, 52.530286],
    },
  },
});
console.log(response1);
